radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic, smooth contour, no focal liver mass; patent main portal vein with hepatopetal flow; no ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD measures 11 mm. Gallbladder is borderline distended with multiple mobile shadowing gallstones; no gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. Pancreas appears within normal limits; spleen normal echogenicity measuring 13.4 cm; normal kidneys without evidence of masses, stones, or hydronephrosis.
